short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline browsing. Group tabs by domain effortlessly. Stay organized, boost productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take charge of your browsing experience with Group Tabs by Domain – the essential Chrome extension designed to streamline your tab management process. Say goodbye to tab clutter and hello to enhanced productivity, all without spending a dime or enduring pesky ads. 

Features:

🔄 Automatic Tab Grouping: Seamlessly categorize your tabs by website domain, ensuring a clutter-free workspace and effortless navigation.

🎯 Customizable Grouping Threshold: Tailor your experience by setting the minimum number of tabs required before automatic grouping kicks in, providing flexibility to match your browsing style.

📌 Exclude Pinned Tabs: Keep important tabs readily accessible by excluding them from the grouping process, maintaining a clear distinction between vital information and everyday browsing.

📉 Auto Collapse Groups: Maximize screen space and minimize distractions with automatic collapsing of inactive tab groups, creating a cleaner browsing environment.

🔝 Move Active Group to End: Easily locate your most recently used tabs by ensuring the active tab group is always moved to the end of the tab bar, simplifying access to important content.

💡 Temporarily Disable Extension: Gain control over when the extension operates by toggling it on or off as needed, providing flexibility and convenience.

-----------------------------------------
Release Note for v0.0.1.1
-----------------------------------------
🔑 Enhanced Keyboard Binding: Fixed the keyboard binding for quick access to our extension. Now, simply press Ctrl + Shift + K to group tabs.

🚀 Improved Group Navigation: When a group is uncollapsed, the extension will now automatically activate the most recently accessed tab within that group. This enhancement eliminates the need for an extra click and streamlines tab navigation, particularly in groups with multiple tabs, saving valuable time and effort.

-----------------------------------------
Release Note for v0.0.1.2
-----------------------------------------
Bug fix for activating last tab within specific group
